description.narrative: This activity (Research and Monitoring & Evaluation) is a component of Private Enterprise Programme Ethiopia reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £3,054,611. This component benefits Ethiopia, and works in the following sector(s): Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: IMC Worldwide, KPMG East Africa, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-04-2013 and the end date is 31-12-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
